slides.title: Tamil Movie Challenge
slides.subtitle: 40 Hard-Level Post-2015 Movie Quizzes - Can You Guess Them All?

slides.question: Hero mass-aa irukkaru but dialogue konjam silent-a dhaan... Heroine oru strong character, college setting. Padathula oru famous car chase sequence irukku - but athu dhaan climax illa. Which 2017 movie?
slides.explanation: Correct! Theeran Adhigaram Ondru (2017) - Karthi as Theeran, Rakul Preet Singh as Priya. Famous BMW car chase sequence, but climax involves the desert fight scene.

slides.question: Oru software engineer hero, but fight panna theriyum. Heroine oru doctor. Story la oru big twist irukku - hero actually vera edhavadhu. 'Naan dhaan adhu' nu solla poraru... Yaaru?
slides.explanation: Ratsasan (2018) - Vishnu as a school teacher turned investigator, Amala Paul as a cop. The twist: the killer is the gentle-looking watchman!

slides.question: Hero police, but uniform pottu irukkara time kammi. Heroine oru journalist. Oru famous dialogue: 'Unakku theriyuma nee enna aagura?' Padam full of suspense, 2019 release.
slides.explanation: Game Over (2019) - Taapsee as a game designer with PTSD. The 'what will happen to you' dialogue refers to the killer's pattern. Psychological thriller with gaming elements.

slides.question: Mass hero, but comedy timing super. Heroine oru independent working woman. Oru scene: hero office la heroine ku help pannuvaru in a funny way. 2018 hit movie.
slides.explanation: Mr. Local (2018) - Hari as a local guy helping Nayanthara's character in her corporate world. Full of comedy scenes in office settings.

slides.question: Double hero movie, but both are same actor. Heroines two different characters. Story involves time travel and parallel universe. 2021 blockbuster.
slides.explanation: Maanaadu (2021) - Silambarasan TR in dual roles, time loop concept. Kalyani Priyadarshan and SJ Suryah in key roles. Revolutionary time-loop thriller.

slides.question: Sports-based movie, but not cricket. Hero from slum area, heroine educated girl. Famous dialogue: 'Nee dhaan enakku vambu' - but actually romantic meaning. 2021 period film.
slides.explanation: Sarpatta Parambarai (2021) - Arya as Kabilan, boxing film set in 1970s North Chennai. Dushara Vijayan as Mariamma, the educated love interest.

slides.question: Hero oru common man, but sudden-a oru responsibility varum. Heroine supportive role. Movie la oru famous train sequence irukku. 2019 thriller.
slides.explanation: Kaithi (2019) - Karthi as Dilli, a common man forced to transport cops. The train sequence shows his escape from villains. No heroine actually!

slides.question: Romantic movie, but hero already married. Twist: heroine actually knows his past. Famous dialogue: 'Love is not about possession' - but padam full of separation scenes. 2018.
slides.explanation: Oh My Kadavule (2020) - Ashok Selvan as Arjun, Ritika Singh as Anu. The 'love is not possession' dialogue when he lets her go. Friends-to-lovers story.

slides.question: Political thriller, but hero is not politician. Heroine reporter. Famous scene: hero public meeting la oru speech kodukkuraaru that becomes viral. 2019 movie.
slides.explanation: NGK (2019) - Suriya as Nandha Gopalan Kumaran, political activist. Sai Pallavi as Geetha, the journalist. The election campaign speech scene is iconic.

slides.question: Horror comedy, but actually social message irukku. Heroine strong character, hero coward initially. Famous dialogue: 'Yedho oru aala irukkan' about the ghost. 2018 hit.
slides.explanation: Dora (2017) - G.V. Prakash as Dora, the coward turned brave. The 'some guy is there' dialogue about the forest spirit. Mix of horror and social message about tribal rights.

slides.question: Cop story, but hero is not typical police. Heroine doctor. Movie la oru famous hospital fight sequence irukku. 2020 release.
slides.explanation: Doctor (2021) - Sivakarthikeyan as Dr. Varun, not a cop but takes law into his hands. Priyanka Arul Mohan as the female lead. The hospital investigation scenes.

slides.question: Family drama, but actually murder mystery. Hero software engineer, heroine homely girl. Twist: everyone in family is suspect. 2019 thriller.
slides.explanation: Drama (2018) - GV Prakash as the son investigating family secrets. Rejina Cassandra as the love interest. Family drama turning into murder mystery.

slides.question: Coming-of-age story, but hero is not young. Heroine childhood friend. Famous dialogue: 'Sometimes wrong decisions lead to right places' - 2020 feel-good movie.
slides.explanation: Meyaadha Maan (2017) - Toshi as Madhu, Priya Bhavani Shankar as Kavya. The movie explores career vs passion themes with nostalgic elements.

slides.question: Action movie with social message. Hero from oppressed community, heroine activist. Famous scene: police station la protest. 2021 critically acclaimed.
slides.explanation: Karnan (2021) - Dhanush as Karnan, Rajisha Vijayan as Draupadi. The police station protest scene is iconic. Based on true events from Kodiyankulam.

slides.question: Sci-fi elements, but set in rural Tamil Nadu. Hero scientist, heroine village girl. Famous dialogue about 'technology and tradition'. 2018 experimental film.
slides.explanation: Indru Netru Naalai (2015) - Vishnu as Elango, Mia George as Madhavi. Time machine concept in contemporary setting. Mix of sci-fi and social elements.

slides.question: Gangster movie, but hero wants to leave crime. Heroine represents normal life. Famous dialogue: 'Naan change aagala' - but actually he changes. 2018 classic.
slides.explanation: Vada Chennai (2018) - Dhanush as Anbu, Aishwarya Rajesh as Padma. Anbu's struggle to leave crime world and build normal life with Padma.

slides.question: Romantic comedy with mistaken identities. Hero rich guy pretending to be poor, heroine middle-class. Famous scene: hero's secret revealed in function. 2019.
slides.explanation: Naan Sirithal (2020) - Hiphop Tamizha as himself, Iswarya Menon as the female lead. The 'rich guy pretending' trope with comedy elements.

slides.question: Political satire, but hero is common man. Heroine TV reporter. Famous dialogue: 'Makkal needhi, makkal needhi' - but actually comedy. 2019.
slides.explanation: LKG (2019) - RJ Balaji as Lalgudi Karuppiah Gandhi, political satire. Priya Bhavani Shankar as the journalist. Comedy take on Tamil Nadu politics.

slides.question: Musical love story, but hero is not singer. Heroine music teacher. Famous song: 'Kannamma' - but actually breakup song. 2018.
slides.explanation: 96 (2018) - Vijay Sethupathi as Ram, Trisha as Janu. The 'Kannamma' song by Chinmayi becomes the emotional core of their reunion story.

slides.question: Crime thriller with female protagonist. Heroine cop, hero suspect initially. Famous twist: the real culprit is least expected person. 2021.
slides.explanation: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal (2020) - Ritu Varma as Kalki the cop, Dulquer Salmaan as Sathyu the conman. The twist about the real mastermind.

slides.question: Period drama, but not about kings. Hero farmer, heroine from upper caste. Famous dialogue about land rights and dignity. 2019 Dhanush movie.
slides.explanation: Asuran (2019) - Dhanush as Sivasamy, Manju Warrier as Pachaiyamma. Based on novel 'Vekkai', about caste oppression and land rights in 1960s Tamil Nadu.

slides.question: Comedy caper, but heroes are not criminals. Actually IT employees. Heroines get involved accidentally. Famous scene: airport la confusion. 2020.
slides.explanation: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan (2015) - Vijay Sethupathi as Pondy Pandi, Nayanthara as Kadambari. IT guy pretending to be rowdy for love. Full of comedy capers.

slides.question: Psychological thriller, hero is not what he seems. Heroine psychiatrist. Famous twist: the patient is actually the doctor. 2020.
slides.explanation: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru (2016) - Rahman as Deepak, the retired cop narrating story. The psychological twist about perception and reality in crime investigation.

slides.question: Sports drama with female protagonist. Heroine cricketer, hero coach. Famous dialogue: 'Cricket is not just game' - about women in sports. 2020.
slides.explanation: Kanaa (2018) - Aishwarya Rajesh as Kausalya, Sathyaraj as father/coach. About rural girl's journey to become cricketer. Darshan as the supportive coach.

slides.question: Friendship story, but friends become enemies. Hero businessman, heroine catalyst. Famous dialogue: 'Business and friendship never mix'. 2019.
slides.explanation: Mafia Chapter 1 (2020) - Arun Vijay as Jeeva, Prasanna as friends turned rivals. Business conflicts destroying childhood friendship.

slides.question: Mystery thriller in single location. Hero trapped, heroine trying to rescue. Famous twist: the villain is helping them. 2021.
slides.explanation: Boomerang (2022) - Atharvaa as ACP Dheeraj, Megha Akash as Anu. Single location thriller with twists about who's really the villain.

slides.question: Social drama about education. Hero teacher, heroine student activist. Famous scene: college protest about reservation. 2021.
slides.explanation: Uriyadi 2 (2019) - Vijay Kumar as Lenin, the student activist fighting education mafia. Based on real education scams in Tamil Nadu.

slides.question: Romantic fantasy, hero gets second chance in love. Heroine same person different timeline. Famous dialogue: 'Love has no expiry date'. 2020.
slides.explanation: Maara (2021) - Madhavan as Maara, Shraddha Srinath as Jothy. Romantic fantasy about painter and doctor across different timelines.

slides.question: Crime investigation, but hero is not cop. Heroine lawyer. Famous scene: court room climax about human rights. 2021 award winner.
slides.explanation: Jai Bhim (2021) - Suriya as Chandru, the lawyer fighting for tribal rights. Lijomol Jose as Sengeni. Based on true case of police brutality.

slides.question: Biopic, but not about politician. Hero entrepreneur, heroine supportive wife. Famous dialogue about dreams and airline business. 2020.
slides.explanation: Soorarai Pottru (2020) - Suriya as Nedumaaran Rajangam, Aparna Balamurali as Bommi. Based on G.R. Gopinath's book about starting Air Deccan.

slides.question: Horror mystery in village setting. Hero city guy, heroine local girl. Famous twist: the ghost is actually alive. 2018.
slides.explanation: Pisaasu (2014) - Shiva as Siddharth, the violinist. The twist that the 'ghost' is actually a comatose girl in hospital. Horror with emotional twist.

slides.question: Action comedy, hero is stuntman. Heroine director. Famous scene: film shooting location la real fight. 2019.
slides.explanation: Annatthe (2021) - Rajinikanth as Annatthe, the stuntman protecting his sister. Keerthy Suresh as the sister. Action scenes in film industry setting.

slides.question: Mystery in school setting. Hero teacher investigating murders. Heroine colleague. Famous twist: the killer is among staff. 2018.
slides.explanation: Ratsasan (2018) - Vishnu as Arun, the school teacher turned investigator. The school setting and killer among staff members twist.

slides.question: Family comedy, three generations of heroes. Heroines from different backgrounds. Famous dialogue about family values in modern world. 2021.
slides.explanation: Annatthe (2021) - Rajinikanth as the elder brother protecting family. The dialogue about 'family is everything' in modern corrupt world.

slides.question: Sci-fi thriller about memory loss. Hero wakes up with amnesia. Heroine claims to be wife. Famous twist: nothing is real. 2021.
slides.explanation: Maanaadu (2021) - Silambarasan TR as Abdul Khaaliq, stuck in time loop. Kalyani Priyadarshan as the doctor. Amnesia and time loop combination.

slides.question: Political drama based on true events. Hero activist, heroine journalist. Famous dialogue about democracy and people's power. 2019.
slides.explanation: Sarkar (2018) - Vijay as Sundar Ramasamy, the NRI fighting electoral fraud. Keerthy Suresh as the journalist. Based on real voting fraud issues.

slides.question: Romantic drama with career conflicts. Hero chef, heroine entrepreneur. Famous food scenes that became viral. 2021.
slides.explanation: Mafia Chapter 1 (2020) - Arun Vijay as Jeeva, the businessman. The restaurant and food business conflicts forming backdrop for romance.

slides.question: Crime saga spanning decades. Hero grows from small criminal to don. Heroines represent different phases of life. 2018 epic.
slides.explanation: Vada Chennai (2018) - Dhanush as Anbu, growing from young fisherman to gangster. Spanning 30 years of North Chennai gang wars.

slides.question: Supernatural thriller with Indian mythology. Hero archaeologist, heroine historian. Famous twist: the myth is real. 2017.
slides.explanation: 24 (2016) - Suriya in triple role, including scientist with time machine. Samantha as the female lead. Mix of sci-fi and Indian mythology concepts.

slides.question: Courtroom drama based on landmark case. Hero lawyer fighting system. Heroine victim seeking justice. Famous dialogue about constitution. 2021.
slides.explanation: Jai Bhim (2021) - Suriya as Chandru, fighting for tribal justice. The courtroom scenes and constitutional rights dialogues became iconic.

slides.question: Sports drama about underdog team. Hero coach with past trauma. Heroine team manager. Famous climax match sequence. 2022.
slides.explanation: Sarpatta Parambarai (2021) - Arya as Kabilan, the underdog boxer. The final boxing match climax showing his rise from slums to champion.

slides.question: Time-loop thriller with social message. Hero repeating same day. Heroine the key to break loop. Famous dialogue about destiny. 2021.
slides.explanation: Maanaadu (2021) - Silambarasan TR stuck in political assassination time loop. Kalyani Priyadarshan as the doctor who helps break the cycle.

slides.question: Final question: Which 2022 movie had the famous dialogue 'Vikram... Vikram...' that became a mass meme? Hero in dual role, cameo by major star.
slides.explanation: Vikram (2022) - Kamal Haasan as Vikram, with Suriya's cameo as Rolex. The 'Vikram' dialogue in background score became viral meme across Tamil Nadu!

box.content: Congratulations on completing the Tamil Movie Challenge! You've tested your knowledge of 40 post-2015 Tamil films with hard-level riddles and misdirection clues.
box.note: How many did you get right? Share your score and challenge your friends!

footer.tagline: Keeping Tamil movie trivia alive and challenging!
